<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=ac914d10-1fe1-49b6-9646-cb8b1aa54671&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Anker%27s+latest+Prime+charging+devices&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAUaRtieyZLiSuPoV3wi3bhNZZYaQ1NfhkVqHwSysWepF&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fstores%2Fpage%2F02E003AE-8E2D-4752-87E4-D22E842C6269" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/stores/page/02E003AE-8E2D-4752-87E4-D22E842C6269">Anker's latest Prime charging devices</a> are already on sale thanks to some handy coupons. The best deals include the laptop-compatible <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0F66LNB8D&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=ac914d10-1fe1-49b6-9646-cb8b1aa54671&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Prime+Power+Bank+%2826%2C250mAh%2C+300W%29&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAASI-R3_vKAV4KDA0LVzDO1JKAcorPJ2henrv-17OBx7j&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Portable-Charging-TSA-Approved-Included%2Fdp%2FB0F66LNB8D" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Portable-Charging-TSA-Approved-Included/dp/B0F66LNB8D">Prime Power Bank (26,250mAh, 300W)</a>, which is 20 percent off and down to $184 when you clip the on-page coupon on its Amazon page.</p> 
<p>This portable charger delivers a whopping 300W of total output between its two USB-C ports and single USB-A port. Anker says that, thanks to its 140W output (and if you're using a 5A cable), you can top up the battery of an M4 Pro MacBook Pro to 50 percent in 27 minutes and an iPhone 17 Pro Max to 50 percent in 22 minutes. You can keep tabs on what's happening on each port using the display.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span>
<p>
 <core-commerce id="77c60332b3464e90a9556f8e4b4372c5" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Portable-Charging-TSA-Approved-Included/dp/B0F66LNB8D"></core-commerce></p> 
<p>This is also the first Anker power bank that supports up to 250W of input recharging by using both USB-C ports simultaneously. This faster charging can top up the powerbank's own battery to 50 percent in just 13 minutes, according to Anker.</p> 
<p>This model has a capacity of 26,250mAh (99.75Wh), which is very close to the FAA's limit of 100W. It's TSA-approved, so you'll be able to take it on flights. It's capable of taking an M4 MacBook Pro from fully dead to an 80 percent charge. The power bank weighs 1.3 lbs — the same as about three iPhones, Anker says.</p> 
<p>Other Anker Prime devices are on sale too. A new 3-in-1 MagSafe charger — which can top up the batteries of your iPhone, Apple Watch and AirPods with wireless charging case simultaneously — also gets a <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0F9L1PPPJ&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=ac914d10-1fe1-49b6-9646-cb8b1aa54671&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=20+percent+discount+to+%24184&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAARavuokgfkKiDoCZSS1QrMBRbk_UMK_hyb5eodEma9p8&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Compatible-Charging-Certified-Wireless%2Fdp%2FB0F9L1PPPJ%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Compatible-Charging-Certified-Wireless/dp/B0F9L1PPPJ/">20 percent discount to $184</a> when you use a clippable coupon. While there are certainly less expensive 3-in-1 MagSafe options out there, this one includes Qi2 25W support for faster charging, as well as TEC active cooling. Anker suggests this can help speed up charging times and help guard against iPhone battery degradation over time.</p> 
<p>A three-port GaN Prime Charger that plugs into an outlet is 20 percent off too, at <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0F9NK4M7Q&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=ac914d10-1fe1-49b6-9646-cb8b1aa54671&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=%24120+with+a+clippable+coupon&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAcPcsHwpFV0OMpCbahzt19E1NxQJ0WwLElp9dm4APIkB&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FAnker-Charger-Compact-Display-Charging%2Fdp%2FB0F9NK4M7Q%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Anker-Charger-Compact-Display-Charging/dp/B0F9NK4M7Q/">$120 with a clippable coupon</a>. Anker says it's as compact as an AirPods Pro 3 case and can provide a total output of 160W, with up to 140W via a single USB-C cable. The charger is said to offer smart power distribution, and you can monitor what's happening and adjust modes via an onboard display and controls.</p> 
<p>
